Title: Login with valid credentials
Expected Result: Home page loads without errors; navbar visible
Login modal appears and is in focus
Username field accepts input; no validation error
Password field accepts input; no validation error
Username is visible in navbar; user considered authenticated

Title: Invalid login shows clear error
Expected Result: Home page loads without errors; navbar visible
Login modal appears and is in focus
Username field accepts input; no validation error
Password field accepts input; no validation error
Authentication is rejected; a clear, non-revealing error message is shown; user remains logged out
Username NOT shown; no session created

Title: Add product to cart and verify total
Expected Result: Home page loads; categories visible
Category detail page opens
Product detail page opens; product name/price displayed
App shows confirmation (alert/toast/modal); item intended for cart
Confirmation closes; no error
Cart page loads; selected product listed
Line item price equals $360; quantity=1; Total = $360

Title: Checkout validation: missing name
Expected Result: Cart loads; at least one item present
Order/Purchase modal or page appears

Test Steps: Leave Name empty; fill other fields validly
Expected Result: Fields accept input; Name remains empty
Submission blocked; validation message specifically indicates Name is required; no order created
Form can now proceed (use in TC-005)

Title: Checkout success with confirmation ID
Expected Result: Cart shows items and correct total T
Purchase form appears

Test Steps: Fill all required fields with valid data
Expected Result: Inputs accepted; no validation errors
Order succeeds; confirmation modal appears with an ID/amount matching total T
Success message can be dismissed; cart cleared or persisted as per design specification
